# Machine Spindle Specifications

> **Skill ID:** `prism-machine-spec-spindle`
> **Category:** MACHINE
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Speed, power, torque curves

## Capabilities

- Retrieve and validate spindle specifications

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in machine spindle specifications.

- When needing machine spindle specifications capabilities
